query:
WITH old_state AS (
                SELECT id, edited_at FROM users
                WHERE id = $1 OR email = $2
            ),
            updated_state AS (
                UPDATE users
                SET
                    edited_at = CASE
                        WHEN email NOT LIKE 'anon-%@deleted.local' AND
                             deleted_at IS NOT NULL
                        THEN now()
                        ELSE edited_at
                    END,
                    deleted_at = CASE
                        WHEN email NOT LIKE 'anon-%@deleted.local'
                        THEN NULL
                        ELSE deleted_at
                    END
                WHERE id = $1 OR email = $2
                RETURNING
                    id,
                    email,
                    password_hash,
                    email_verified_at,
                    created_at,
                    edited_at,
                    deleted_at
            )
            SELECT
                u.id,
                u.email,
                u.password_hash,
                u.email_verified_at,
                u.created_at,
                u.edited_at,
                u.deleted_at,
                os.edited_at AS "old_edited_at"
            FROM updated_state AS u
            JOIN old_state AS os ON u.id = os.id
